title: She Got Me: Imani
description: A Hip Hop dance competition in Tokyo leaves Imani and Marquis wanting more.They always longed for one another, and, if Imani had any say it in, they always would. Even though Marquis might not admit it, Imani didn't need him to tell her how he felt. She could tell by the way he looked at her in practice. They were drawn to each other like magnets, and nothing either of them knew what the next step would be.Marquis made Imani feel like a queen. He was the only one who understood her mind, body and soul and she had to have him. Will she be able to get Marquis to leave his college girlfriend and reignite their lost love? Or is it far too late?
author: Just Bae
